title: The Family
overview: The Family is an Australian fly-on-the-wall documentary series. It is the Australian version of the British series of the same name.The series will follow the Cardamone family - father Angelo, mother Josephine, and sons David (20), Stefan (18), and Adrian (14) - through their daily lives. They have allowed 35 remote-controlled cameras to follow their every move, day and night, for three months.
